metadata.name: Table
metadata.description: A simple table component for displaying tabular data with semantic HTML structure

rows.description: 2D array representing table rows and cells

variant.description: Visual style variant of the table

size.description: Size variant affecting padding and font size

responsive.description: Whether to wrap table in horizontal scroll container on small screens

caption.description: Table caption for accessibility and context

className.description: Additional CSS classes for styling customization

features: Semantic table structure with proper thead, tbody elements
Table caption support for screen readers
Proper th elements with scope attributes for headers
High contrast borders and text for visibility
Focus management for interactive elements within cells
keyboard_navigation: Tab navigation through interactive elements in cells
Standard table navigation with screen readers

examples.name: Basic Table
examples.description: Simple table with headers and data rows

examples.name: Striped Table
Responsive Bordered Table
examples.description: Bordered table with responsive horizontal scrolling

key_features: WCAG AAA compliant with proper semantics
Support for React nodes in cells

unit_tests: Renders table with correct headers and rows
accessibility_tests: Color contrast meets WCAG AAA standards

optimization_notes: Optional responsive wrapper to reduce DOM when not needed

props_validation.headers: Must be non-empty array of strings
props_validation.rows: Must be 2D array matching headers length
props_validation.caption: Must be string if provided

error_handling: Graceful handling of mismatched row/header lengths
Empty state when no rows provided
Console warnings for invalid prop combinations
